A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was the best movie I've ever seen in my entire life. I was mind blown after watching it. I couldn't take it all in. When I was leaving the theater\, I wanted to watch it five more times. I've been a Star Wars fan for years\, and not because I was raised to loved Star Wars\, in fact no one in family\, or my close friends were huge Star Wars fans. I on my own decided to watch Star Wars and that started what would become my intense passion for Star Wars. I have watched every SW movie that's come out. I'll be honest\, I was extremely excited for The Last Jedi\, but I had become slightly jaded once the premiere came. Once I started watching it\, the jadedness went away and I was left with pure emotion. During the film\, I almost cried\, I laughed a lot\, I was upset and joyful and full of suspense and in shock.  I had so many feelings\, I couldn't take it all in!! It was so ingenious and well written. The acting was phenomenal and story was wonderful. I never wanted it to end. I can not wait to watch it again.
